Bitcoin: A Peer-to-Peer Electronic Cash System

The paper that first introduced Bitcoin

Satoshi Nakamoto's original paper is still recommended reading for anyone studying how Bitcoin works. Choose which translation of the paper you want to read:

  • English (Original)
  • Հայերեն
    translated by Diana Sisakian, sponsored by ClearTalks
  • Bahasa Indonesia
    translated by Christopher Tahir, Gregorius Airlangga, K Hendrawan
  • Czech
    translated by braiins.com
  • Deutsch
    translated by Daniel Deckner
  • Español
    translated by Breathingdog
  • Français
    translated by Arnaud-François Fausse
  • Italiano
    translated by Terzim
  • Lietuvių Kalba
    translated by Domas Dranginis
  • Magyar Nyelv
    translated by Balaxi
  • मराठी
    translated by Shivaji Ambedkar
  • Nederlands
    translated by GiftBitNL
  • Norsk (Bokmål)
    translated by Kryptografen.no
  • Íslenska
    translated by PEGA Pool
  • Polski
    translated by meeDamian
  • Português
    translated by rhlinden
  • Português Brasileiro
    translated by Rodrigo Silva Pinto
  • Română
    translated by Gazeta Bitcoin
  • Slovenčina
    translated by Ondrej Sarnecký
  • српски
    translated by Božo Popović
  • Suomen kieli
    translated by Biocycle, LohkoKettu, Aleksi Suomalainen, Antti Majakivi, Niko Laamanen
  • Svenska
    translated by hanspandeya
  • Türkçe
    translated by Efe Cini
  • ελληνικά
    translated by chdimosthenis
  • मानक हिन्दी
    translated by Praneet Jain
  • اُردُو
    translated by Muhammad Safdar Jamal
  • தமிழ்
    translated by Raja Sahaya Jose
  • മലയാളം
    translated by Hyder Ali Abdulla
  • עברית
    translated by Meni Rosenfeld
  • Русский
    translated by Ar Vicco, Ivan Nikolaev
  • Tiếng Việt
    translated by Pham Cong Dinh
  • Yкраїнська
    translated by WTFBit
  • العربية
    translated by Ahmed Alsayadi
  • پارسی
    translated by ZeeAmini
  • 한국어
    translated by Mincheol Im
  • 日本語
    translated by hakka
  • ภาษาไทย
    translated by Peeraphat Hankongkaew
  • 简化字
    translated by shdxiang, Bill Zhao
  • বাংলা
    translated by Shafiun Miraz, Tonmoy Sarkar
  • Estonian
    translated by ekukxs
  • Albanian
    translated by Tony Xhufi
  • Croatian
    translated by LuxBTC
  • Braille
    translated by @NeatNik
  • Nepali
    translated by Krishna Dahal, Bibek Koirala
  • Basque
    translated by @Blooma_Lorea

Do you want to translate the paper into your language? Visit the Bitcoin white paper repository on GitHub for instructions and open an issue if you have any questions.
